fields.name: Long Island Iced Tea
fields.recipe:
½ ounce Vodka
½ ounce Rum
½ ounce Gin
½ ounce Tequila
½ ounce Triple Sec
1 ounce sour mix
1 ounce cola

fields.name: Moscow Mule
fields.recipe:
Pour 2 ounces Vodka, ½ ounce Lime Juice, and 4 ounces Ginger Beer into a copper mug.
Add ice and garnish with a lime slice. Serve immediately!

fields.name: Vodka Tonic
fields.recipe:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour in 1½ ounces of vodka and stir several times.
Pour 4 ounces of tonic water and fill leaving space from the top.
Add a ½ ounce each of lemon juice and lime juice.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

fields.name: Cosmopolitan
fields.recipe:
Place 1 ounce vodka or orange vodka, 1 ounce cranberry juice, ½ ounce Triple Sec, ½ ounce lemon juice, and ½ ounce simple syrup in a cocktail shaker with ice.
Shake 15 seconds until cold.
Strain the liquid into a martini glass.

fields.name: White Russian
fields.recipe:
Add 2 ounces Vodka and 1 ounce Coffee Liqueur to a glass with ice.
Top with 1 ounce of heavy cream.
Stir until cold.
